Package com.camerontec.catalys.server.schedule

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ISchedule  
    IScheduledTask  
    IScheduler
    This object is used to schedule and unschedule tasks.
    ISchedulingFactory
    Provides convenience methods to manage schedule tasks.
    ITimeSpec
    Represents a time or set of times such as "every Friday".
    ScheduledTaskMXBean  
    TaskMXBean  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ConfigurationSchedulingFactory
    Implementation of an ISchedulingFactory which is configured using the configuration registry and the objects registered within it.
    NullSchedulingFactory
    Implementation of ISchedulingFactory used when no license for the Scheduling option is present.
    Schedule  
    ScheduledTask
    Standard implementation of IScheduledTask.
    ScheduledTaskMXBeanImpl  
    Scheduler
    Component based implementation of IScheduler.
    ScheduleValidator
    Validates that schedules and event lists are configured appropriately.
    SchedulingFactoryFactory
    Utility class to obtain an instance of ISchedulingFactory.
    Task
    Base implementation of an ITask.
    TaskMXBeanImpl  
    TimeParser  
    TimeSpec
    Implementation of ITimeSpec based on the JDRing package.
